name: Trolley-ho
description:
Ludum Dare 48: Deeper and Deeper

Trolley-Ho

Once a year, the novice Dwarves of Bottomless Mountain compete to earn their place in the deepest mines.

How to play: You can move your cart forward and backward and you can jump tracks. Get more gems then the other dwarves to win.

Move Forward - ‘W’ key

Move Backward - ‘S’ key

Jump Track right - ‘D’ and ‘Space’ key.

Jump track left - ‘A’ and ‘Space’ key.

To pause game press ‘Escape’ key

If you submitted a game for LudumDare - 48 as well you can participate in the voting and give us a review here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/trolley-ho

Thank you for playing our game. We hope you had fun.
